meanings.sent1: The cat overleaped the fence effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: The athlete overleaped the hurdle with grace.
meanings.sent3: The kangaroo overleaped the puddle, avoiding a wet landing.
meanings.sent4: Her determination overleaped any obstacles in her path.
meanings.sent5: The superhero overleaped the building in a single bound.

meanings.definition: To surpass or exceed in leaping
meanings.sent1: The deer overleaped the stream, setting a new record.
meanings.sent2: The frog overleaped all its competitors in the leap competition.
meanings.sent3: The rabbit overleaped its own expectations, reaching great heights.
meanings.sent4: His enthusiasm overleaped everyone else's efforts.
meanings.sent5: The gazelle overleaped the distance effortlessly, leaving others behind.

meanings.definition: To skip over or disregard in a leap
meanings.sent1: She overleaped the boring parts of the book to get to the exciting ending.
meanings.sent2: The student overleaped the difficult questions and focused on the easy ones.
meanings.sent3: The child overleaped the vegetables on his plate, going straight for dessert.
meanings.sent4: He overleaped the negative comments and focused on the positive feedback.
meanings.sent5: The detective overleaped the red herrings and solved the case quickly.
